translation: Priv (ae nby) pnnis rb sndi navh sintụ̄ yymụ̄ pạd kvr.
Lgith gmczi khvunh dathi nishhi kvrun ansan pạd.
Priv tuhund rb chuh bvdd krym.
Yymụ̄ qlmh kh dhryʿh ʿlm hychihnvv.
Ansans diytun suh ʿlm yus nh suh zanan avs. (yim chih qrāni mjydkụ̄ sarive brvunttihm āyat yim rsvlu Allah ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmn pytth nạzl spdụ̄)

Hrgz nh, ansan chuh srkshy kran (yim āyat ge tamhi vqth nạzl yylhi nbvt kis mnṣbs pytth srfraz spdnh pth ḥẓvr ṣly Allah ʿlyh v slmv ḥrmas mnz nmaz prnụ̄ shrvʿ kr, th abvjhln yaczhav tim nmaz prnh nishhi rukavnụ̄).
Aath binahs pytth zi suh chuh pnnis pans benyaz vuchhan.
(ḥalankh) chuh pzụ̄ pạtthụ̄ phyrun tuhndis rbs kunue.
Tohyih vuchhvunh suh shkhṣ yus mnʿ chuh kran,
Akis bnds yylhi suh nmaz chuh pran?
Tuhund kya khyal chuh agr (suh bndh) syzi vthi pytth āshi.
Ya āshi prhyzgạry hund tlqyn kran.
Tuhund kya khyal chuh agr (yih mnʿ krn vvl shkhṣ) aapuz āshi zanan th roe āshi pihran?
Kya suh chuhna zanan zi Allah tʿālyā chuh vuchhan?
Hrgz nh, hrgah suh baz āv nh, ddykh pytthuk mas rttith lamav asụ̄ tas.
Tath ddyks yus apziyvr th khṭakar chuh.
Suh lạyin nad pnnyn ḥạmiyan hnzi jmạʿcz.
Hrgz nh, tmụ̄ snz kth mah mạniv th sjdh kriv th pnnis rb sund qurub (nzdyky) kriv ḥạṣl.
